Our mission

We are Pangea Educational Development, but you can call us PED for short. Our mission is to empower students and unite communities through the development of sustainable school sites in under-resourced areas â€“ from Uganda to Michigan to Illinois, with an ever-growing reach. We are a 501(c)3 non-profit organization dedicated to providing essential resources to schools and creating sustainable education programs that ensure the wellbeing of students around the world.
